author: Special Correspondent
text:
A woman was robbed of a gold chain weighing five sovereigns by motorcycle-borne culprits in Airport police station limits on Friday.

V. Thenmozhi was returning home riding a two-wheeler after dropping her son in a school when the culprits struck. The motorcycle-borne duo hit Thenmozhi’s vehicle. When she fell, the culprits snatched the gold chain from her and fled. The Airport police are investigating.
title: Woman robbed of gold chain
